title: Die Mercurii 11 Aug. 1647. The Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled, doe approve of the late action of the officers, souldiers, and inhabitants of the borough of Southwarke, ...
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: printed for John Wright at the Kings Head in the Old Bayley,
notes: Approving the action of the officers, soldiers, and inhabitants of Southwark in joining the army -- Cf. Steele.
Also approving the actions of one Colonell Blunt, as well as the Committee of the Militia of the County of Herts.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
